== Doxygen Documenation ==

This project has been documented using the
[http://www.stack.nl/~dimitri/doxygen/index.html doxygen] style of
documentation.  A doxygen config file has been provided to convert the inline
documentation to HTML.

Run:<br>
<code>doxygen doxygen.conf</code><br>
Then browse the documentation at <tt>html/index.html</tt>.
